name: Escape From Finger Castle
description:
ESCAPE FROM FINGER CASTLE
You play as a man with a hammer, held captive by evil thumbs, but instead of submitting to your fingery overlords you fight.

Controls:
WASD / Arrow keys
"," & "." / "Z" & "X"
"E" to interact

All feedback welcome!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/hjalte_tagmose

The game isn't really done because of a bunch of travelling and spending all my time doing other stuff.

Enjoy!
